name: BigJig Jigsaw 6 Puzzle
summary: A JG6 file is a jigsaw puzzle used by Lena Games BigJig (version 6 and later), a computer-based jigsaw puzzle game. It contains a photo or painting broken into puzzle pieces a user can put back together in BigJig. BigJig users may break up puzzles into eight styles: classic, modern, curl, artistic, bony, scrappy, distorted, and spriggy.
